results.title: Evaluation and management of COVID-19-related severity in people with type 2 diabetes
results.text_hl: The combined use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and the use of corticosteroids might be significant to prevent @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@ from becoming @<m>DISEASE_Critical_Illness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016638 @@@critically ill@@@ from @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@.
